pages.text: The Resonance Table works by bombarding a resonant crystal with a catalyst, infusing it with new properties. The process is slow and requires a stable power source.

pages.title: Infused Amethyst
pages.text: An Amethyst Shard is infused with the energy of Redstone to create a stable, programmable crystal.

pages.title: Infused Celenite
pages.text: A Celenite Crystal is infused with the energy of Redstone to create a highly performant, programmable crystal.
